item.title: Christchurch in Bloom Summer 2009
item.itunes:author: Christchurch Carrickfergus
item.description: The Floral Cart at the Castle Carrickfergus is sponsored by Christchurch Carrickfergus in conjunction with the Carrickfergus Borough Council. The beautiful display of summer flowers is dedicated annually by the pastors and people of Christchurch.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Floral Cart at the Castle Carrickfergus is sponsored by Christchurch Carrickfergus in conjunction with the Carrickfergus Borough Council. The beautiful display of summer flowers is dedicated annually by the pastors and people of Christchurch.

item.itunes:author: Rev Dr S Grant
item.description: Psalm 36:7How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.

item.itunes:author: Rev Dr Samuel Grant

item.title: Joseph - Faithful man of God
item.itunes:author: Rev Dr Samuel Grant
item.description: Matthew 1:18Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew 1:18 Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost. Sermon by Rev Dr S Grant, Christchurch Carrickfergus.
item.itunes:summary: Matthew 1:18Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.
